snippet: Agents from the F.D.A.’s Office of Criminal Investigations visited the New England Compounding Center in Framingham, Mass., for the first time, acting on a sealed warrant.
abstract: Criminal investigators from the Food and Drug Administration visit the New England Compounding Center in Framingham, Mass, acting on a sealed warrant; visit is the first public indication that the federal government is preparing a case against the company linked to a deadly meningitis outbreak.

byline.original: By SABRINA TAVERNISE and DENISE GRADY

lead_paragraph: Agents from the F.D.A.’s Office of Criminal Investigations visited the New England Compounding Center in Framingham, Mass., for the first time, acting on a sealed warrant.

headline.seo: Investigators Visit Office Tied to Meningitis
headline.main: Investigators Visit Company Tied to Meningitis Cases
headline.print_headline: Investigators Visit Company Tied to Meningitis Cases
